import React from "react"; import { Link, useParams } from "react-router-dom"; import { FontAwesomeIcon } from "@fortawesome/react-fontawesome"; import Rating from "../components/ui/Rating"; import Price from "../components/ui/Price"; import Book from "../components/ui/Book"; export default function BookInfo({ books, addToCart, cart }) { const { id } = useParams(); const book = books.find((book) => +book.id === +id); function addBookToCart(book) { addToCart(book); } function bookExistsOnCart() { return cart.find((book) => +book.id === +id); } return (
